Stripe Product Analyst Intern (Remote) 2026

Work with Stripe product teams to analyze funnels, pricing experiments, and new bet performance in a remote internship.

What you will work on

  • Analyze payment funnels, checkout adoption, and pricing experiments.
  • Build dashboards and self-serve tools for product managers and GTM.
  • Investigate anomalies and recommend guardrails for launches.

What makes you a fit

  1. Strong SQL and comfort with experimentation metrics.
  2. Experience in BI tools and clear written communication.
  3. Product curiosity and ability to reason about trade-offs.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen on remote readiness.
  • Technical SQL/analytics round.
  • Product sense discussion with PM/Analyst.
  • Team fit conversation; offer with stipend details.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 5 March 2026.
